actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the National Housing Act, to prohibit a mutual savings and loan association from converting into a stock savings and loan institution.

summary.text: Prohibits a mutual savings and loan association from coverting into a stock savings and loan institution. Authorizes the Federal Savings and loan Insurance Corporation to take action necessary to implement or enforce this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the National Housing Act, to prohibit a mutual savings and loan association from converting into a stock savings and loan institution.
